019package org.jgrapes.webconsole.base;
020
021import java.io.BufferedReader;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.Reader;
024import java.io.Serializable;
025import java.io.StringWriter;
026import java.net.URL;
027import java.nio.CharBuffer;
028import java.time.Duration;
029import java.time.Instant;
030import java.util.Collection;
031import java.util.Collections;
032import java.util.HashMap;
033import java.util.HashSet;
034import java.util.Iterator;
035import java.util.Locale;
036import java.util.Map;
037import java.util.Map.Entry;
038import java.util.Optional;
039import java.util.ResourceBundle;
040import java.util.Set;
041import java.util.UUID;
042import java.util.WeakHashMap;
043import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
044import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
045import java.util.concurrent.Future;
046import java.util.function.Supplier;
047import java.util.stream.Collectors;
048import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
049import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
050import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
051import org.jgrapes.core.Components.Timer;
052import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
053import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
054import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.HandlerDefinition.ChannelReplacements;
055import org.jgrapes.core.events.Detached;
056import org.jgrapes.http.Session;
057import org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel;
058import org.jgrapes.io.events.Closed;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
060import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
061import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
062import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConletDeleted;
063import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConletResourceRequest;
064import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
065import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.DeleteConlet;
066import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
067import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
068import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
069import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequest;
070import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
071import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
072import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.UpdateConletType;
073
074/**
075 * Provides a base class for implementing web console components.
076 * The class provides the following support functions:
077 *  * "Translate" the conlet related events to invocations
078 *    of abstract methods. This is mainly a prerequisite
079 *    for implementing the other support functions.
080 *  * Optionally manage state for a conlet instance.
081 *  * Optionally track the existing previews or views of
082 *    a conlet, thus allowing the server side to send update
083 *    events (usually when the state changes on the server side).
084 *  * Optionally refresh existing previews or views periodically
085 * 
086 * # Event handling
087 * 
088 * The following diagrams show the events exchanged between
089 * the {@link WebConsole} and a web console component from the 
090 * web console component's perspective. If applicable, they also show 
091 * how the events are translated by the {@link AbstractConlet} to invocations 
092 * of the abstract methods that have to be implemented by the
093 * derived class (the web console component that provides
094 * a specific web console component type).
095 * 
096 * ## ConsoleReady
097 * 
098 * ![Add web console component type handling](AddConletTypeHandling.svg)
099 * 
100 * From the web console's page point of view, a web console component 
101 * consists of CSS and JavaScript that is added to the console page by
102 * {@link AddConletType} events and HTML that is provided by 
103 * {@link RenderConlet} events (see below). These events must 
104 * therefore be generated by a web console component. 
105 * 
106 * The {@link AbstractConlet} does not provide support for generating 
107 * an {@link AddConletType} event. The handler for the 
108 * {@link ConsoleReady} that generates this event must be implemented by
109 * the derived class itself.
110 * 
111 * ## AddConletRequest
112 * 
113 * ![Add web console component handling](AddConletHandling.svg)
114 * 
115 * The {@link AddConletRequest} indicates that a new web console component
116 * instance of a given type should be added to the page. The
117 * {@link AbstractConlet} checks the type requested, and if
118 * it matches, invokes {@link #generateInstanceId generateInstanceId}
119 * and{@link #createNewState createNewState}.
120 * If the conlet has associated state, the information is saved with
121 * {@link #putInSession putInSession}. Then 
122 * {@link #doRenderConlet doRenderConlet} is invoked, which must 
123 * render the conlet in the browser. Information about the rendered views
124 * is returned and used to track the views.
125 * 
126 * Method {@link #doRenderConlet doRenderConlet} renders the preview 
127 * or view by firing a {@link RenderConlet} event that provides to 
128 * the console session the HTML that represents the web console 
129 * component on the page. The HTML may be generated using and thus 
130 * depending on the component state.
131 * Alternatively, state independent HTML may be provided followed 
132 * by a {@link NotifyConletView} event that updates
133 * the HTML (using JavaScript) on the console page. The latter approach
134 * is preferred if the model changes frequently and updating the
135 * rendered representation is more efficient than providing a new one.
136 * 
137 * ## RenderConletRequest
138 * 
139 * ![Render web console component handling](RenderConletHandling.svg)
140 * 
141 * A {@link RenderConletRequest} event indicates that the web console page
142 * needs the HTML for displaying a web console component. This may be caused
143 * by e.g. the initial display, by a refresh or by requesting a full 
144 * page view from the preview.
145 * 
146 * Upon receiving such an event, the {@link AbstractConlet}
147 * checks if it has state information for the component id
148 * requested. If not, it calls {@link #recreateState recreateState} 
149 * which allows the conlet to e.g. retrieve state information from
150 * a backing store.
151 * 
152 * Once state information has been obtained, the method 
153 * invokes as when adding a new conlet by invoking
154 * {@link #doRenderConlet doRenderConlet}.
155 * 
156 * ## ConletDeleted
157 * 
158 * ![Web console component deleted handling](ConletDeletedHandling.svg)
159 * 
160 * When the {@link AbstractConlet} receives a {@link ConletDeleted},
161 * it updates the information about the shown conlet views. If the
162 * conlet is no longer used in the browser (no views remain),
163 * it deletes the state information from the session. In any case, it
164 * invokes {@link #doConletDeleted doConletDeleted} with the 
165 * state information.
166 * 
167 * ## NotifyConletModel
168 * 
169 * ![Notify web console component model handling](NotifyConletModelHandling.svg)
170 * 
171 * If the web console component views include input elements, actions 
172 * on these elements may result in {@link NotifyConletModel} events from
173 * the web console page to the web console. When the {@link AbstractConlet}
174 * receives such events, it retrieves any existing state information. 
175 * It then invokes {@link #doUpdateConletState doUpdateConletState} with the
176 * retrieved information. The web console component usually responds with
177 * a {@link NotifyConletView} event. However, it can also
178 * re-render the complete conlet view.
179 * 
180 * Support for unsolicited updates
181 * -------------------------------
182 * 
183 * The class tracks the relationship between the known
184 * {@link ConsoleSession}s and the web console components displayed 
185 * in these console session. The information is available from
186 * {@link #conletInfosByConsoleSession}. It can e.g. be used to send
187 * events to the web console(s) in response to an event on the server
188 * side.
189 *
190 * @param <S> the type of the conlet's state information
191 * 
192 * @startuml AddConletTypeHandling.svg
193 * hide footbox
194 * 
195 * activate WebConsole
196 * WebConsole -> Conlet: ConsoleReady
197 * deactivate WebConsole
198 * activate Conlet
199 * Conlet -> WebConsole: AddConletType 
200 * deactivate Conlet
201 * activate WebConsole
202 * deactivate WebConsole
203 * @enduml
204 * 
205 * @startuml AddConletHandling.svg
206 * hide footbox
207 * 
208 * activate WebConsole
209 * WebConsole -> Conlet: AddConletRequest
210 * deactivate WebConsole
211 * activate Conlet
212 * Conlet -> Conlet: generateInstanceId
213 * activate Conlet
214 * deactivate Conlet
215 * Conlet -> Conlet: createNewState
216 * activate Conlet
217 * deactivate Conlet
218 * opt if state
219 *     Conlet -> Conlet: putInSession
220 *     activate Conlet
221 *     deactivate Conlet
222 * end opt
223 * Conlet -> Conlet: doRenderConlet
224 * activate Conlet
225 * Conlet -> WebConsole: RenderConlet
226 * activate WebConsole
227 * deactivate WebConsole
228 * opt
229 *     Conlet -> WebConsole: NotifyConletView
230 *     activate WebConsole
231 *     deactivate WebConsole
232 * end opt
233 * deactivate Conlet
234 * Conlet -> Conlet: start conlet tracking
235 * @enduml
236 * 
237 * @startuml RenderConletHandling.svg
238 * hide footbox
239 * 
240 * activate WebConsole
241 * WebConsole -> Conlet: RenderConletRequest
242 * deactivate WebConsole
243 * activate Conlet
244 * Conlet -> Conlet: stateFromSession
245 * activate Conlet
246 * deactivate Conlet
247 * opt if not found
248 *     Conlet -> Conlet: recreateState
249 *     activate Conlet
250 *     deactivate Conlet
251 * end opt
252 * Conlet -> Conlet: doRenderConlet
253 * activate Conlet
254 * Conlet -> WebConsole: RenderConlet 
255 * activate WebConsole
256 * deactivate WebConsole
257 * opt 
258 *     Conlet -> WebConsole: NotifyConletView
259 * activate WebConsole
260 * deactivate WebConsole
261 * end opt 
262 * deactivate Conlet
263 * Conlet -> Conlet: update conlet tracking
264 * @enduml
265 * 
266 * @startuml NotifyConletModelHandling.svg
267 * hide footbox
268 * 
269 * activate WebConsole
270 * WebConsole -> Conlet: NotifyConletModel
271 * deactivate WebConsole
272 * activate Conlet
273 * Conlet -> Conlet: stateFromSession
274 * activate Conlet
275 * deactivate Conlet
276 * Conlet -> Conlet: doUpdateConletState
277 * activate Conlet
278 * opt
279 *     Conlet -> WebConsole: RenderConlet
280 * end opt 
281 * opt 
282 *     Conlet -> WebConsole: NotifyConletView
283 * end opt 
284 * deactivate Conlet
285 * deactivate Conlet
286 * @enduml
287 * 
288 * @startuml ConletDeletedHandling.svg
289 * hide footbox
290 * 
291 * activate WebConsole
292 * WebConsole -> Conlet: ConletDeleted
293 * deactivate WebConsole
294 * activate Conlet
295 * Conlet -> Conlet: stateFromSession
296 * activate Conlet
297 * deactivate Conlet
298 * alt all views deleted
299 *     Conlet -> Conlet: removeState
300 *     activate Conlet
301 *     deactivate Conlet
302 *     Conlet -> Conlet: stop conlet tracking
303 * else
304 *     Conlet -> Conlet: update conlet tracking
305 * end alt
306 * Conlet -> Conlet: doConletDeleted
307 * activate Conlet
308 * deactivate Conlet
309 * deactivate Conlet
310 * @enduml
311 */
312@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.TooManyMethods",
313    "PMD.EmptyMethodInAbstractClassShouldBeAbstract", "PMD.GodClass",
314    "PMD.ExcessiveImports" })
315public abstract class AbstractConlet<S extends Serializable>
316        extends Component {
317
318    /** Separator used between type and instance when generating the id. */
319    public static final String TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR = "~";
320    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
321        "PMD.VariableNamingConventions", "PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap",
322        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
323    private static final Map<Class<?>,
324            Map<Locale, ResourceBundle>> supportedLocales
325                = Collections.synchronizedMap(new WeakHashMap<>());
326    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
327        "PMD.VariableNamingConventions", "PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap" })
328    private static final Map<Class<?>,
329            Map<Locale, ResourceBundle>> l10nBundles
330                = Collections.synchronizedMap(new WeakHashMap<>());
331    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.LongVariable")
332    private Map<ConsoleSession,
333            Map<String, ConletTrackingInfo>> conletInfosByConsoleSession;
334    private Duration refreshInterval;
335    private Supplier<Event<?>> refreshEventSupplier;
336    private Timer refreshTimer;
337
338    /**
339     * Creates a new component that listens for new events
340     * on the given channel.
341     * 
342     * @param channel the channel to listen on
343     */
344    public AbstractConlet(Channel channel) {
345        this(channel, null);
346    }
347
348    /**
349     * Like {@link #AbstractConlet(Channel)}, but supports
350     * the specification of channel replacements.
351     *
352     * @param channel the channel to listen on
353     * @param channelReplacements the channel replacements (see
354     * {@link Component})
355     */
356    public AbstractConlet(Channel channel,
357            ChannelReplacements channelReplacements) {
358        super(channel, channelReplacements);
359        conletInfosByConsoleSession
360            = Collections.synchronizedMap(new WeakHashMap<>());
361    }
362
363    /**
364     * If set to a value different from `null` causes an event
365     * from the given supplier to be fired on all tracked web console
366     * sessions periodically.
367     *
368     * @param interval the refresh interval
369     * @param supplier the supplier
370     * @return the web console component for easy chaining
371     */
372    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.LinguisticNaming")
373    public AbstractConlet<S> setPeriodicRefresh(
374            Duration interval, Supplier<Event<?>> supplier) {
375        refreshInterval = interval;
376        refreshEventSupplier = supplier;
377        if (refreshTimer != null) {
378            refreshTimer.cancel();
379            refreshTimer = null;
380        }
381        updateRefresh();
382        return this;
383    }
384
385    private void updateRefresh() {
386        if (refreshInterval == null || conletIdsByConsoleSession().isEmpty()) {
387            // At least one of the prerequisites is missing, terminate
388            if (refreshTimer != null) {
389                refreshTimer.cancel();
390                refreshTimer = null;
391            }
392            return;
393        }
394        if (refreshTimer != null) {
395            // Already running.
396            return;
397        }
398        refreshTimer = Components.schedule(tmr -> {
399            tmr.reschedule(tmr.scheduledFor().plus(refreshInterval));
400            fire(refreshEventSupplier.get(), trackedSessions());
401        }, Instant.now().plus(refreshInterval));
402    }
403
404    /**
405     * Returns the web console component type. The default implementation
406     * returns the name of the class.
407     * 
408     * @return the type
409     */
410    protected String type() {
411        return getClass().getName();
412    }
413
414    /**
415     * A default handler for resource requests. Checks that the request
416     * is directed at this web console component, and calls 
417     * {@link #doGetResource}.
418     * 
419     * @param event the resource request event
420     * @param channel the channel that the request was recived on
421     */
422    @Handler
423    public final void onConletResourceRequest(
424            ConletResourceRequest event, IOSubchannel channel) {
425        // For me?
426        if (!event.conletClass().equals(type())) {
427            return;
428        }
429        doGetResource(event, channel);
430    }
431
432    /**
433     * The default implementation searches for a file with the 
434     * requested resource URI in the web console component's class 
435     * path and sets its {@link URL} as result if found.
436     * 
437     * @param event the event. The result will be set to
438     * `true` on success
439     * @param channel the channel
440     */
441    protected void doGetResource(ConletResourceRequest event,
442            IOSubchannel channel) {
443        URL resourceUrl = this.getClass().getResource(
444            event.resourceUri().getPath());
445        if (resourceUrl == null) {
446            return;
447        }
448        event.setResult(new ResourceByUrl(event, resourceUrl));
449        event.stop();
450    }
451
452    /**
453     * Provides a resource bundle for localization.
454     * The default implementation looks up a bundle using the
455     * package name plus "l10n" as base name. Note that the bundle 
456     * returned for a given locale may be the fallback bundle.
457     * 
458     * @return the resource bundle
459     */
460    protected ResourceBundle resourceBundle(Locale locale) {
461        return ResourceBundle.getBundle(
462            getClass().getPackage().getName() + ".l10n", locale,
463            getClass().getClassLoader(),
464            ResourceBundle.Control.getNoFallbackControl(
465                ResourceBundle.Control.FORMAT_DEFAULT));
466    }
467
468    /**
469     * Returns bundles for the given locales. 
470     * 
471     * The default implementation uses {@link #resourceBundle(Locale)} 
472     * to lookup the bundles. The method is guaranteed to return a 
473     * bundle for each requested locale even if it is only the fallback 
474     * bundle. The evaluated results are cached for the conlet class.
475     *
476     * @param toGet the locales to get bundles for
477     * @return the map with locales and bundles
478     */
479    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
480    protected Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> l10nBundles(Set<Locale> toGet) {
481        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
482        Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> result = new HashMap<>();
483        for (Locale locale : toGet) {
484            ResourceBundle bundle;
485            synchronized (l10nBundles) {
486                // Due to the nested computeIfAbsent, it is not sufficient
487                // that l10nBundels is thread safe.
488                bundle = l10nBundles
489                    .computeIfAbsent(getClass(),
490                        cls -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>())
491                    .computeIfAbsent(locale, l -> resourceBundle(locale));
492            }
493            result.put(locale, bundle);
494        }
495        return Collections.unmodifiableMap(result);
496    }
497
498    /**
499     * Provides localizations for the given key for all requested locales.
500     * 
501     * The default implementation uses {@link #l10nBundles(Set)} to obtain
502     * the localizations.
503     *
504     * @param locales the requested locales
505     * @param key the key
506     * @return the result
507     */
508    protected Map<Locale, String> localizations(Set<Locale> locales,
509            String key) {
510        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
511        Map<Locale, String> result = new HashMap<>();
512        Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> bundles = l10nBundles(locales);
513        for (Map.Entry<Locale, ResourceBundle> entry : bundles.entrySet()) {
514            result.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue().getString(key));
515        }
516        return result;
517    }
518
519    /**
520     * Returns the supported locales and the associated bundles.
521     * 
522     * The default implementation invokes {@link #resourceBundle(Locale)}
523     * with all available locales and drops results with fallback bundles.
524     * The evaluated results are cached for the conlet class.
525     *
526     * @return the result
527     */
528    protected Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> supportedLocales() {
529        return supportedLocales.computeIfAbsent(getClass(), cls -> {
530            ResourceBundle.clearCache(cls.getClassLoader());
531            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
532            Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> bundles = new HashMap<>();
533            for (Locale locale : Locale.getAvailableLocales()) {
534                if ("".equals(locale.getLanguage())) {
535                    continue;
536                }
537                ResourceBundle bundle = resourceBundle(locale);
538                if (bundle.getLocale().equals(locale)) {
539                    bundles.put(locale, bundle);
540                }
541            }
542            return bundles;
543        });
544    }
545
546    /**
547     * Create the instance specific part of a conlet id. The default
548     * implementation generates a UUID. Derived classes override this
549     * method if e.g. the instance specific part must include a key that
550     * associates the conlet's state with some backing store. 
551     * 
552     * @param event the event that triggered the creation of a new conlet,
553     * which may contain required information 
554     * (see {@link AddConletRequest#properties()})
555     * @param session the console session; usually not required 
556     * but provided as context
557     *
558     * @return the web console component id
559     */
560    protected String generateInstanceId(AddConletRequest event,
561            ConsoleSession session) {
562        return UUID.randomUUID().toString();
563    }
564
565    /**
566     * Creates an instance of the type that represents the conlet's state.
567     * The default implementation returns {@link Optional#isEmpty()}, 
568     * thus indicating that no state information is needed or available.
569     *
570     * @param event the event, which may contain required information 
571     * (see {@link AddConletRequest#properties()})
572     * @param session the console session, sometimes required to
573     * send events to components that provide a backing store
574     * @param conletId the conlet id calculated as
575     * `type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR + generateInstanceId(...)` 
576     * @return the state representation or {@link Optional#empty()} if none is
577     * required
578     * @throws Exception if an exception occurs
579     */
580    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException",
581        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
582    protected Optional<S> createStateRepresentation(
583            RenderConletRequestBase<?> event, ConsoleSession session,
584            String conletId) throws Exception {
585        return Optional.empty();
586    }
587
588    /**
589     * Called by {@link #onAddConletRequest}
590     * when a new conlet instance is created in the browser. The default
591     * implementation simply invokes {@link 
592     * #createStateRepresentation} and returns its result. If state
593     * is provided, it is put in the browser session by the invoker.
594     *
595     * @param event the event 
596     * @param session the console session
597     * @param conletId the conlet id
598     * @return the state representation or {@link Optional#empty()} if none is
599     * required
600     * @throws Exception if an exception occurs
601     */
602    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException",
603        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
604    protected Optional<S> createNewState(
605            AddConletRequest event, ConsoleSession session,
606            String conletId) throws Exception {
607        return createStateRepresentation(event, session, conletId);
608    }
609
610    /**
611     * Called by {@link #onRenderConletRequest} when a previously 
612     * created conlet (with associated state) is rendered in a new 
613     * browser session for the first time. The default implementation 
614     * simply invokes {@link #createStateRepresentation} and returns 
615     * its result. Conlets with long-term state should retrieve 
616     * their state from some storage. If state is returned, it is
617     * put in the browser session by the invoker.
618     *
619     * @param event the event 
620     * @param session the console session
621     * @param conletId the conlet id
622     * @return the state representation or {@link Optional#empty()} if none is
623     * required
624     * @throws Exception if an exception occurs
625     */
626    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException",
627        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
628    protected Optional<S> recreateState(
629            RenderConletRequest event, ConsoleSession session,
630            String conletId) throws Exception {
631        return createStateRepresentation(event, session, conletId);
632    }
633
634    /**
635     * Returns the tracked sessions and conlet ids as map.
636     * 
637     * If you need a particular session's web console component ids, you 
638     * should prefer {@link #conletIds(ConsoleSession)} over calling
639     * this method with `get(consoleSession)` appended.
640     * 
641     * @return the result
642     */
643    protected Map<ConsoleSession, Set<String>> conletIdsByConsoleSession() {
644        return conletInfosByConsoleSession.entrySet().stream()
645            .collect(Collectors.toMap(Entry::getKey,
646                e -> new HashSet<>(e.getValue().keySet())));
647    }
648
649    /**
650     * Returns the tracked sessions. This is effectively
651     * `conletInfosByConsoleSession().keySet()` converted to
652     * an array. This representation is especially useful 
653     * when the web console sessions are used as argument for 
654     * {@link #fire(Event, Channel...)}.
655     *
656     * @return the web console sessions
657     */
658    protected ConsoleSession[] trackedSessions() {
659        Set<ConsoleSession> sessions = new HashSet<>(
660            conletInfosByConsoleSession.keySet());
661        return sessions.toArray(new ConsoleSession[0]);
662    }
663
664    /**
665     * Returns the set of web console component ids associated with the 
666     * console session as a {@link Set}. If no web console components 
667     * have registered yet, an empty set is returned.
668     * 
669     * @param consoleSession the console session
670     * @return the set
671     */
672    protected Set<String> conletIds(ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
673        return new HashSet<>(conletInfosByConsoleSession.getOrDefault(
674            consoleSession, Collections.emptyMap()).keySet());
675    }
676
677    /**
678     * Returns a map of all conlet ids and the modes in which 
679     * views are currently rendered. 
680     *
681     * @param consoleSession the console session
682     * @return the map
683     */
684    protected Map<String, Set<RenderMode>>
685            conletViews(ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
686        return conletInfosByConsoleSession.getOrDefault(
687            consoleSession, Collections.emptyMap()).entrySet().stream()
688            .collect(Collectors.toMap(e -> e.getKey(),
689                e -> e.getValue().renderedAs));
690    }
691
692    /**
693     * Track the given web console component from the given session. 
694     * This is invoked by 
695     * {@link #onAddConletRequest(AddConletRequest, ConsoleSession)} and
696     * {@link #onRenderConletRequest(RenderConletRequest, ConsoleSession)}.
697     * It needs only be invoked if either method is overridden.
698     *
699     * @param consoleSession the web console session
700     * @param conletId the conlet id
701     * @param info the info to be added if currently untracked. If `null`,
702     * a new {@link ConletTrackingInfo} is created and added
703     * @return the conlet tracking info
704     */
705    protected ConletTrackingInfo trackConlet(ConsoleSession consoleSession,
706            String conletId, ConletTrackingInfo info) {
707        ConletTrackingInfo result;
708        synchronized (conletInfosByConsoleSession) {
709            Map<String, ConletTrackingInfo> infos
710                = conletInfosByConsoleSession.computeIfAbsent(consoleSession,
711                    newKey -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>());
712            result = infos.computeIfAbsent(conletId,
713                key -> Optional.ofNullable(info)
714                    .orElse(new ConletTrackingInfo(conletId)));
715        }
716        updateRefresh();
717        return result;
718    }
719
720    /**
721     * Helper that provides access to a storage space for this 
722     * conlet type in the browser session.
723     *
724     * @param session the session
725     * @return the map
726     */
727    private Map<String, S> typeContext(Session session) {
728        synchronized (session) {
729            @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
730            Map<String, Map<String, S>> abstractConletContext
731                = (Map<String, Map<String, S>>) session
732                    .computeIfAbsent(AbstractConlet.class,
733                        k -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>());
734            return abstractConletContext
735                .computeIfAbsent(type(), k -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>());
736        }
737    }
738
739    /**
740     * Puts the given web console component state in the session using the 
741     * {@link #type()} and the given web console component id as keys.
742     * 
743     * @param session the session to use
744     * @param conletId the web console component id
745     * @param conletState the web console component state
746     * @return the component state
747     */
748    protected Serializable putInSession(Session session, String conletId,
749            S conletState) {
750        typeContext(session).put(conletId, conletState);
751        return conletState;
752    }
753
754    /**
755     * Returns the state of this web console component's type 
756     * with the given id from the session.
757     *
758     * @param session the session to use
759     * @param conletId the web console component id
760     * @return the web console component state
761     */
762    protected Optional<S> stateFromSession(Session session, String conletId) {
763        return Optional.ofNullable(typeContext(session).get(conletId));
764    }
765
766    /**
767     * Returns all conlet ids and conlet states of this web console 
768     * component's type from the session.
769     *
770     * @param session the console session
771     * @return the states
772     */
773    protected Collection<Map.Entry<String, S>>
774            statesFromSession(ConsoleSession session) {
775        return typeContext(session.browserSession()).entrySet();
776    }
777
778    /**
779     * Removes the web console component state of the 
780     * web console component with the given id from the session. 
781     * 
782     * @param session the session to use
783     * @param conletId the web console component id
784     * @return the removed state if state existed
785     */
786    protected Optional<S> removeState(Session session, String conletId) {
787        S state = typeContext(session).remove(conletId);
788        return Optional.ofNullable(state);
789    }
790
791    /**
792     * Checks if the request applies to this component. If so, stops the event,
793     * creates a new conlet id (see {@link #generateInstanceId}) and 
794     * new state information (see {@link #createNewState}). The state
795     * is saved in the session (see {@link #putInSession}),
796     * {@link #doRenderConlet} is called and its result is passed to
797     * {@link #trackConlet}.
798     *
799     * @param event the event
800     * @param consoleSession the channel
801     * @throws Exception the exception
802     */
803    @Handler
804    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException",
805        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
806    public final void onAddConletRequest(AddConletRequest event,
807            ConsoleSession consoleSession) throws Exception {
808        if (!event.conletType().equals(type())) {
809            return;
810        }
811        event.stop();
812        String conletId = type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR
813            + generateInstanceId(event, consoleSession);
814        Optional<S> state = createNewState(event, consoleSession, conletId);
815        state.ifPresent(s -> putInSession(
816            consoleSession.browserSession(), conletId, s));
817        event.setResult(conletId);
818        trackConlet(consoleSession, conletId, new ConletTrackingInfo(conletId)
819            .addModes(doRenderConlet(event, consoleSession, conletId,
820                state.orElse(null))));
821    }
822
823    /**
824     * Checks if the request applies to this component. If so, stops 
825     * the event. If the conlet is completely removed from the browser,
826     * removes the web console component state from the 
827     * browser session. In all cases, it calls {@link #doConletDeleted} 
828     * with the state.
829     * 
830     * @param event the event
831     * @param consoleSession the web console session
832     * @throws Exception the exception
833     */
834    @Handler
835    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
836    public final void onConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
837            ConsoleSession consoleSession) throws Exception {
838        if (!event.conletId().startsWith(type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR)) {
839            return;
840        }
841        String conletId = event.conletId();
842        Optional<S> model = stateFromSession(
843            consoleSession.browserSession(), conletId);
844        var trackingInfo = trackConlet(consoleSession, conletId, null)
845            .removeModes(event.renderModes());
846        if (trackingInfo.renderedAs().isEmpty()
847            || event.renderModes().isEmpty()) {
848            removeState(consoleSession.browserSession(), conletId);
849            for (Iterator<Entry<ConsoleSession, Map<String,
850                    ConletTrackingInfo>>> csi = conletInfosByConsoleSession
851                        .entrySet().iterator();
852                    csi.hasNext();) {
853                Map<String, ConletTrackingInfo> infos = csi.next().getValue();
854                infos.remove(conletId);
855                if (infos.isEmpty()) {
856                    csi.remove();
857                }
858            }
859            updateRefresh();
860        } else {
861            trackConlet(consoleSession, conletId, null)
862                .removeModes(event.renderModes());
863        }
864        event.stop();
865        doConletDeleted(event, consoleSession, event.conletId(),
866            model.orElse(null));
867    }
868
869    /**
870     * Called by {@link #onConletDeleted} to propagate the event to derived
871     * classes.
872     *
873     * @param event the event
874     * @param channel the channel
875     * @param conletId the web console component id
876     * @param conletState the conlet's state; may be `null` if the
877     * conlet doesn't have associated state information
878     * @throws Exception if a problem occurs
879     */
880    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
881    protected void doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event, ConsoleSession channel,
882            String conletId, S conletState)
883            throws Exception {
884        // May be defined by derived class.
885    }
886
887    /**
888     * Checks if the request applies to this component by verifying 
889     * if the component id starts with {@link #type()} 
890     * plus {@link #TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR}.
891     * If the id matches, sets the event's result to `true`, stops the 
892     * event and tries to retrieve the model from the session. If this
893     * fails, {@link #recreateState} is called as another attempt to
894     * obtain state information.
895     *  
896     * Finally, {@link #doRenderConlet} is called and the result is added
897     * to the tracking information. 
898     *
899     * @param event the event
900     * @param consoleSession the web console session
901     * @throws Exception the exception
902     */
903    @Handler
904    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
905    public final void onRenderConletRequest(RenderConletRequest event,
906            ConsoleSession consoleSession) throws Exception {
907        if (!event.conletId().startsWith(type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR)) {
908            return;
909        }
910        Optional<S> state = stateFromSession(
911            consoleSession.browserSession(), event.conletId());
912        if (state.isEmpty()) {
913            state = recreateState(event, consoleSession, event.conletId());
914            state.ifPresent(s -> putInSession(consoleSession.browserSession(),
915                event.conletId(), s));
916        }
917        event.setResult(true);
918        event.stop();
919        Set<RenderMode> rendered = doRenderConlet(
920            event, consoleSession, event.conletId(), state.orElse(null));
921        trackConlet(consoleSession, event.conletId(), null).addModes(rendered);
922    }
923
924    /**
925     * Called by 
926     * {@link #onAddConletRequest(AddConletRequest, ConsoleSession)} and
927     * {@link #onRenderConletRequest(RenderConletRequest, ConsoleSession)} 
928     * to complete rendering the web console component.
929     * 
930     * The 
931     *
932     * @param event the event
933     * @param channel the channel
934     * @param conletId the component id
935     * @param conletState the conlet's state; may be `null` if the
936     * conlet doesn't have associated state information
937     * @return the rendered modes
938     * @throws Exception the exception
939     */
940    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
941    protected abstract Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(
942            RenderConletRequestBase<?> event, ConsoleSession channel,
943            String conletId, S conletState)
944            throws Exception;
945
946    /**
947     * Invokes {@link #doSetLocale(SetLocale, ConsoleSession, String)}
948     * for each web console component in the console session.
949     * 
950     * If the vent has the reload flag set, does nothing.
951     * 
952     * The default implementation fires a 
953     *
954     * @param event the event
955     * @param consoleSession the web console session
956     * @throws Exception the exception
957     */
958    @Handler
959    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
960    public void onSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession consoleSession)
961            throws Exception {
962        if (event.reload()) {
963            return;
964        }
965        for (String conletId : conletIds(consoleSession)) {
966            if (!doSetLocale(event, consoleSession, conletId)) {
967                event.forceReload();
968                break;
969            }
970        }
971    }
972
973    /**
974     * Called by {@link #onSetLocale(SetLocale, ConsoleSession)} for
975     * each web console component in the console session. Derived 
976     * classes must send events for updating the representation to 
977     * match the new locale.
978     * 
979     * If the method returns `false` this indicates that the representation 
980     * cannot be updated without reloading the web console page.
981     * 
982     * The default implementation fires a {@link RenderConletRequest}
983     * with tracked render modes (one of or both {@link RenderMode#Preview}
984     * and {@link RenderMode#View}), thus updating the known representations.
985     * (Assuming that "Edit" and "Help" modes are represented with modal 
986     * dialogs and therefore locale changes aren't possible while these are 
987     * open.) 
988     *
989     * @param event the event
990     * @param channel the channel
991     * @param conletId the web console component id
992     * @return true, if adaption to new locale without reload is possible
993     * @throws Exception the exception
994     */
995    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
996    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession channel,
997            String conletId) throws Exception {
998        fire(new RenderConletRequest(event.renderSupport(), conletId,
999            trackConlet(channel, conletId, null).renderedAs()),
1000            channel);
1001        return true;
1002    }
1003
1004    /**
1005     * If {@link #stateFromSession(Session, String)} returns a model,
1006     * calls {@link #doUpdateConletState} with the model. 
1007     *
1008     * @param event the event
1009     * @param channel the channel
1010     * @throws Exception the exception
1011     */
1012    @Handler
1013    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
1014    public final void onNotifyConletModel(NotifyConletModel event,
1015            ConsoleSession channel) throws Exception {
1016        if (!event.conletId().startsWith(type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR)) {
1017            return;
1018        }
1019        Optional<S> model
1020            = stateFromSession(channel.browserSession(), event.conletId());
1021        doUpdateConletState(event, channel, model.orElse(null));
1022    }
1023
1024    /**
1025     * Called by {@link #onNotifyConletModel} to complete handling
1026     * the notification. The default implementation does nothing.
1027     * 
1028     * @param event the event
1029     * @param channel the channel
1030     * @param conletState the conlet's state; may be `null` if the
1031     * conlet doesn't have associated state information
1032     */
1033    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
1034    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
1035            ConsoleSession channel, S conletState) throws Exception {
1036        // Default is to do nothing.
1037    }
1038
1039    /**
1040     * Removes the {@link ConsoleSession} from the set of tracked sessions.
1041     * If derived web console components need to perform extra actions when a
1042     * console session is closed, they have to override 
1043     * {@link #afterOnClosed(Closed, ConsoleSession)}.
1044     * 
1045     * @param event the closed event
1046     * @param consoleSession the web console session
1047     */
1048    @Handler
1049    public final void onClosed(Closed event, ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
1050        conletInfosByConsoleSession.remove(consoleSession);
1051        updateRefresh();
1052        afterOnClosed(event, consoleSession);
1053    }
1054
1055    /**
1056     * Invoked by {@link #onClosed(Closed, ConsoleSession)} after
1057     * the web console session has been removed from the set of
1058     * tracked sessions. The default implementation does
1059     * nothing.
1060     * 
1061     * @param event the closed event
1062     * @param consoleSession the web console session
1063     */
1064    protected void afterOnClosed(Closed event, ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
1065        // Default is to do nothing.
1066    }
1067
1068    /**
1069     * Calls {@link #doRemoveConletType()} if this component
1070     * is detached.
1071     *
1072     * @param event the event
1073     */
1074    @Handler
1075    public void onDetached(Detached event) {
1076        if (!equals(event.node())) {
1077            return;
1078        }
1079        doRemoveConletType();
1080    }
1081
1082    /**
1083     * Iterates over all sessions and fires {@link DeleteConlet}
1084     * events for all known conlets and a {@link UpdateConletType} 
1085     * (with no render modes) event.
1086     */
1087    protected void doRemoveConletType() {
1088        conletIdsByConsoleSession().forEach((session, conletIds) -> {
1089            conletIds.forEach(conletId -> {
1090                session.respond(
1091                    new DeleteConlet(conletId, RenderMode.basicModes));
1092            });
1093            session.respond(new UpdateConletType(type()));
1094        });
1095    }
1096
1097    /**
1098     * The information tracked about web console components that are
1099     * used by the console. It includes the component's id and the
1100     * currently rendered views (only preview and view are tracked,
1101     * with "deletable preview" mapped to "preview").
1102     */
1103    protected static class ConletTrackingInfo {
1104        private final String conletId;
1105        private final Set<RenderMode> renderedAs;
1106
1107        /**
1108         * Instantiates a new conlet tracking info.
1109         *
1110         * @param conletId the conlet id
1111         */
1112        public ConletTrackingInfo(String conletId) {
1113            this.conletId = conletId;
1114            renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
1115        }
1116
1117        /**
1118         * Returns the conlet id.
1119         *
1120         * @return the id
1121         */
1122        public String conletId() {
1123            return conletId;
1124        }
1125
1126        /**
1127         * The render modes current used.
1128         *
1129         * @return the render modes
1130         */
1131        public Set<RenderMode> renderedAs() {
1132            return renderedAs;
1133        }
1134
1135        /**
1136         * Adds the given modes.
1137         *
1138         * @param modes the modes
1139         * @return the conlet tracking info
1140         */
1141        public ConletTrackingInfo addModes(Set<RenderMode> modes) {
1142            if (modes.contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
1143                renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
1144            }
1145            if (modes.contains(RenderMode.View)) {
1146                renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
1147            }
1148            return this;
1149        }
1150
1151        /**
1152         * Removes the given modes.
1153         *
1154         * @param modes the modes
1155         * @return the conlet tracking info
1156         */
1157        public ConletTrackingInfo removeModes(Set<RenderMode> modes) {
1158            renderedAs.removeAll(modes);
1159            return this;
1160        }
1161
1162        @Override
1163        public int hashCode() {
1164            return conletId.hashCode();
1165        }
1166
1167        @Override
1168        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
1169            if (this == obj) {
1170                return true;
1171            }
1172            if (obj == null) {
1173                return false;
1174            }
1175            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
1176                return false;
1177            }
1178            ConletTrackingInfo other = (ConletTrackingInfo) obj;
1179            if (conletId == null) {
1180                if (other.conletId != null) {
1181                    return false;
1182                }
1183            } else if (!conletId.equals(other.conletId)) {
1184                return false;
1185            }
1186            return true;
1187        }
1188    }
1189
1190    /**
1191     * Returns a future string providing the result
1192     * from reading everything from the provided reader. 
1193     *
1194     * @param request the request, used to obtain the 
1195     * {@link ExecutorService} service related with the request being
1196     * processed
1197     * @param contentReader the reader
1198     * @return the future
1199     */
1200    public Future<String> readContent(RenderConletRequestBase<?> request,
1201            Reader contentReader) {
1202        return readContent(
1203            request.processedBy().map(pby -> pby.executorService())
1204                .orElse(Components.defaultExecutorService()),
1205            contentReader);
1206    }
1207
1208    /**
1209     * Returns a future string providing the result
1210     * from reading everything from the provided reader. 
1211     *
1212     * @param execSvc the executor service for reading the content
1213     * @param contentReader the reader
1214     * @return the future
1215     */
1216    public Future<String> readContent(ExecutorService execSvc,
1217            Reader contentReader) {
1218        return execSvc.submit(() -> {
1219            StringWriter content = new StringWriter();
1220            CharBuffer buffer = CharBuffer.allocate(8192);
1221            try (Reader rdr = new BufferedReader(contentReader)) {
1222                while (true) {
1223                    if (rdr.read(buffer) < 0) {
1224                        break;
1225                    }
1226                    buffer.flip();
1227                    content.append(buffer);
1228                    buffer.clear();
1229                }
1230            } catch (IOException e) {
1231                throw new IllegalStateException(e);
1232            }
1233            return content.toString();
1234        });
1235    }
1236
1237}
